data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word مَكَانًا comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.

data.meanings: bore it, carried it, took it up, carried it, convey, show/manifest, conceive.
data.sentence: The word فَحَمَلَتْهُ comes from the root ح م ل and is associated with the meanings: bore it, carried it, took it up, carried it, convey, show/manifest, conceive.

data.meanings: (Nun-Ba-Thal) to throw, fling, give up, cast off, reject, throw a thing because of its worthlessness or not taking into account.
data.sentence: The word فَانْتَبَذَتْ comes from the root ن ب ذ and is associated with the meanings: (Nun-Ba-Thal) to throw, fling, give up, cast off, reject, throw a thing because of its worthlessness or not taking into account.

data.meanings: distant/remote, far, go far away. quswa - more remote, further.
data.sentence: The word قَصِيًّا comes from the root ق ص و and is associated with the meanings: distant/remote, far, go far away. quswa - more remote, further.
